org.apache.shiro.realm.jdbc
Enum JdbcRealm.SaltStyle

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<JdbcRealm.SaltStyle>
      org.apache.shiro.realm.jdbc.JdbcRealm.SaltStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<JdbcRealm.SaltStyle>
Enclosing class:
JdbcRealm
public static enum JdbcRealm.SaltStyle
extends Enum<JdbcRealm.SaltStyle>

Password hash salt configuration.

  • NO_SALT - password hashes are not salted.
  • CRYPT - password hashes are stored in unix crypt format.
  • COLUMN - salt is in a separate column in the database.
  • EXTERNAL - salt is not stored in the database. JdbcRealm.getSaltForUser(String) will be called to get the salt
